articles.title: Philippine Supreme Court rules impeachment bid against vice president is unconstitutional - apnews.com
articles.description: The Philippine Supreme Court has ruled an impeachment case against Vice President Sara Duterte violated the country’s constitution due to a technicality. The decision blocks her upcoming trial over a raft of criminal allegations including her threat to have t…
articles.content: MANILA, Philippines (AP) The Philippine Supreme Court ruled Friday that an impeachment case filed against Vice President Sara Duterte violated the countrys constitution due to a key technicality, a d… [+4649 chars]
